semantic_title: Coding Guidelines for Encounter for COVID-19 Antibody Testing
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 1. Chapter 1: Certain Infectious and Parasitic Diseases > g. Coronavirus infections > 1. COVID-19 infections > k. Encounter for antibody testing

content.full_text: For an encounter for antibody testing that is not being performed to confirm a current COVID-19 infection, nor is a follow-up test after resolution of COVID-19, assign Z01.84, Encounter for antibody response examination. Follow the applicable guidelines above if the individual is being tested to confirm a current COVID-19 infection. For follow-up testing after a COVID-19 infection, see guideline I.C.1.g.1.j. (Evidence: pg no: 31, L46-L50)
content.summary: Specifies coding for COVID-19 antibody testing encounters, distinguishing between different testing purposes (Evidence: pg no: 31, L46-L50)
key_concepts: Antibody testing not for current infection confirmation (Evidence: pg no: 31, L46-L48)
Z01.84 code assignment for antibody response examination (Evidence: pg no: 31, L48)
Different coding for current infection testing (Evidence: pg no: 31, L48-L49)
Follow-up testing reference (Evidence: pg no: 31, L49-L50)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Assign Z01.84 for antibody testing not confirming current infection or follow-up (Evidence: pg no: 31, L46-L48)
detailed_rules.explanation: When an encounter is for antibody testing that is not being performed to confirm a current COVID-19 infection and is not a follow-up test after resolution of COVID-19, assign Z01.84 (Evidence: pg no: 31, L46-L48)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Use different coding for current infection confirmation testing (Evidence: pg no: 31, L48-L49)
detailed_rules.explanation: If the individual is being tested to confirm a current COVID-19 infection, follow the applicable guidelines above rather than using Z01.84 (Evidence: pg no: 31, L48-L49)

workflow_steps: Step 1: Determine purpose of antibody testing
Step 2: If not for current infection confirmation or follow-up, assign Z01.84
Step 3: If for current infection confirmation, use applicable COVID-19 guidelines
Step 4: If for follow-up after infection, refer to guideline I.C.1.g.1.j
